belongs_to_collection.name: Metal Gear Solid: Digital Graphic Novel Collection

overview: The renowned Metal Gear Solid comic book series by Ashley Wood and Kris Oprisko comes to life in this motion comic, complete with stylized animation, thrilling music, explosive sound effects and full voice acting. A retelling of Hideo Kojima's video game of the same name.
title: Metal Gear Solid: Digital Graphic Novel
